2 - Reported based on the methodologies and guidance set out within the Corporate Emissions Reduction Transparency (CERT) report Guidelines FY2022-23 and CY2023
We commit to reduce absolute scope 1 and 2 GHG emissions 95% by 2030, from a 2021 base year
We commit to reduce scope 3 GHG emissions 30% by 20230, from a 2021 base year
We commit to maintaining at least 95% absolute scope 1 and 2 GHG emissions reductions from 2030 through 2050, from a 2021 base year
We commit to reduce scope 3 GHG emissions 90% by 2050, from a 2021 base year
We commit to reach net-zero GHG emissions across our value chain by 2050
